Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Josh Wegener
Message:
security: Add 'set -euo pipefail' to lib/ and scripts/ directories

- Added strict error handling to all lib/ scripts
- Added strict error handling to all scripts/ scripts
- Removed duplicate 'set -e' lines where found
- Ensures scripts fail fast on errors, undefined variables, and pipe failures

Part of security hardening initiative to pass shell-security.test.sh
